evidence.text: VERIFIED COMPLAINT AND EX PARTE APPLICATION FOR TRO AND PI, NOTICE OF EXPARTE APPLICATION FOR TRO AND PI FOR INJUNCTIVE RELIEF TO HALT IMPLEMENTATION OF SAN RAFAEL MUNICIPAL CODE §§19.50 AND SMC 19.20.080(C) ON AUGUST 16TH 2023

extracted.value: Plaintiff: Temporary Restraining Order and Preliminary Injunction

evidence.source_document: Verified Complaint and Ex Parte Application for TRO and PI, Notice of Exparte Application for TRO and PI for Injunctive Relief to Halt Implementation of San Rafael Code 19.50 and SMC 19.20.080(c) on August 16th 2023
evidence.text: (a) The Court issue a temporary restraining order and preliminary injunction enjoining defendants from enforcing SMC §§19.50 and SMC §19.20.080(c)

extracted.value: Plaintiff: Temporary Restraining Order and Preliminary Injunction enjoining defendants from enforcing SMC §§19.50 and SMC §19.20.080(c)

evidence.source_document: Verified Complaint and Ex Parte Application for TRO and PI, Notice of Exparte Application for TRO and PI for Injunctive Relief to Halt Implementation of San Rafael Code 19.50 and SMC 19.20.080(c) on August 16th 2023
evidence.text: (b) The Court issue a temporary restraining order and preliminary injunction enjoining defendants from destroying Camp Integrity, and otherwise displacing residents in a manner that violates their constitutional rights.

extracted.value: Plaintiff: Temporary Restraining Order and Preliminary Injunction enjoining defendants from destroying Camp Integrity

evidence.source_document: Verified Complaint and Ex Parte Application for TRO and PI, Notice of Exparte Application for TRO and PI for Injunctive Relief to Halt Implementation of San Rafael Code 19.50 and SMC 19.20.080(c) on August 16th 2023
evidence.text: (c) The Court issue a permanent injunction from violating plaintiffs Civil Rights as pleaded above.

extracted.value: Plaintiff: Permanent injunction from violating plaintiffs' Civil Rights

evidence.source_document: Verified Complaint and Ex Parte Application for TRO and PI, Notice of Exparte Application for TRO and PI for Injunctive Relief to Halt Implementation of San Rafael Code 19.50 and SMC 19.20.080(c) on August 16th 2023

evidence.text: (e) The court appoint plaintiffs an attorney as the court deems necessary for effective justice.

evidence.source_document: Verified Complaint and Ex Parte Application for TRO and PI, Notice of Exparte Application for TRO and PI for Injunctive Relief to Halt Implementation of San Rafael Code 19.50 and SMC 19.20.080(c) on August 16th 2023
evidence.text: (f) The court appoint Camp Integrity with an attorney to represent it as an unincorporated association.
